G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
Class Game is for game initialization.
Game() - Constructor for class Game
 
GameObject - Class in <Unnamed>
Abstract Class GameObject handles all the gaming objects, namely player character, enemy, fireBall, coin.
GameObject(Map) - Constructor for class GameObject
Class constructor needs map instance for allocate game object into suitable coordinate.
GameOverScene - Class in <Unnamed>
Class GameOverScene is scene shown when player is dead.
GameOverScene() - Constructor for class GameOverScene
Class constructor declares background image, font details of final score description
GAMEOVERSCENE - Static variable in class SceneManager
Define Game over scene as 0
GAMETITLE - Static variable in class Game
Defines the title of the Stage.
GameWindow - Class in <Unnamed>
Class GameWindow is inherited from Canvas, which help to defines window sizes and draw background image.
GameWindow(int, int) - Constructor for class GameWindow
Class constructor specifying window width and height as well as getting image.
getCollisionHegiht() - Method in class Coin
Retrieve height of collision size.
getCollisionHeight() - Method in class EatPeopleFlower
Retrieve height of collision size of the flower.

Retrieve collision height.
getCollisionWidth() - Method in class Coin
Retrieve width of collision size.
getCollisionWidth() - Method in class EatPeopleFlower
Retrieve width of collision size of the flower.
getCollisionWidth() - Method in class GameObject
Retrieve collision width.
getCurrentScene() - Method in class SceneManager
Retrieve current type of scene.
getDamage() - Method in class Bullet
Retrieve the damage of a bullet.
getDamage() - Method in class EatPeopleFlower
Retrieve damage a flower made to player.
getDamage() - Method in class Enemy
Retrieve damage of enemy made to player if collision happens.
getHeight() - Method in class GameObject
Retrieve height of game object.
getHp() - Method in class Character
Retrieve the current health point of a character.
getImage() - Method in class Animation
Get image of current frame.
getImage() - Method in class Tile
Get image of tile instance.
getImageByName(String) - Static method in class MultimediaHelper
Returns an Image object that can then be painted on the screen.

Get instance of SceneManager class
getInstance() - Static method in class ScoreSystem
Retrieve an instance of ScoreSytem class, otherwise create a new one.
getLatestScore() - Method in class ScoreSystem
 
getMap() - Method in class Map
Get map array.
getMaxHP() - Method in class Character
Retrieve the maximum health point of a character.
getMusicByName(String) - Static method in class MultimediaHelper
Returns a music object that can then be played during gameplay.
getPlayerName() - Method in class Score
Retrieve name of the player.
getScore() - Method in class Score
Retrieve score of the current game play.
getSubImage(Image, int, int, int, int) - Static method in class MultimediaHelper
Returns writable image object that can then be played during gameplay.
